Email Masker is an open-source browser extension that helps you generate and use masked email addresses for your online accounts using Quick Aliases powered by Skiff Mail.

It helps you protect your privacy and keep your inbox clean from spam.

Note: You need to have a Skiff Mail account where you can setup your own Quick Aliases domain. The extension does not require you to sign-in or has anything to do with your Skiff account. After you get your Quick Aliases domain, you can setup the email format and start using the extension right away.

Permissions Note: The extension merely uses the basic permissions to generate a masked email on-page or in the extension when you use the [domain] shortcode in your email format but it does not access anything beyond the hostname of the current website and does not share any details externally nor stores it. The same can be verified by reviewing the full source code available on GitHub: https://github.com/irazasyed/email-masker.
